name: Meowsh-Pit
description:
Everyone loves cats! Everyone loves stage diving! What more could you wish for than a short game about those two very things! 

use a + d to surf the crowd.

Meowsh-Pit was made in 48 hours for Hardcore Punk Jam 4

music by

Alexander Boudreau

griphook

(reuploaded with a  minor bug fix)
